name.description: Name for the batch of cells used in the experiment.
name.title: Cell Line Batch Name

description.description: Please include a description or any other helpful comments or annotations for the cell line.
description.title: Description

labBatchLabel.description: Lab-specific ID for the batch of cells used in the experiment
labBatchLabel.title: Lab Batch Label

providerName.description: Vendor or lab that supplied the cell line.
providerName.title: Provider Name

providerCatalogId.description: ID or catalogue number assigned by the vendor or provider to the cell line
providerCatalogId.title: Provider Catalog ID

providerBatchId.description: Batch number or lot number assigned to the cells supplied by the vendor or provider
providerBatchId.title: Provider Batch ID

cellLineName.description: The cell line name as found in the Cell Line Ontology. Must be a child term of 'immortal cell line cell'.
cellLineName.title: Cell Line Name
